creator: jrw@pobox.com
text:
The <javaresource> type seems to always use the system class in preference to
any classpath supplied by an attribute or a nested classpath element.

creator: jrw@pobox.com
text:
Created attachment 19407
Test case demonstrating the problem.

The script test-ant.sh in the file runs a variety of tests and prints which
ones fail to give the expected result.

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
You are correct, but backwards compatibility is going to byte us.

svn revision 810060 introduces a new parentfirst attribute, set this to false and your tests pass.
